Html:
I'm sorry if this has been asked before. I'm frantically looking around the internet trying to find the solution to the problem, and would only ask here if I couldn't come up with anything on my own.

I upgraded to 0.9 a couple days ago, but haven't worked on this particular project that is giving me trouble until today. I'm finding today that TypeScript isn't generating AMD style modules.

Hrmmm... I should also mention that I upgraded to Windows 8 recently, so maybe that's where the change took place.

Can someone point me in the right direction?

I did notice the __exports = __thing, but adding that to my TypeScript seems to only make TypeScript generate something like module.exports = ...

I've never seen __module.exports = __ and, from what I can tell, that's not the syntax to that requirejs uses.
